p: Stochastic simulations demonstrate that priming for persistence on the index farm is the most likely scenario consistent with pig and human epidemiology for R 0 values >2.5 (up to R 0 = 30, the highest value examined), and simulations with an R 0 value in this range best reproduce the very high seroprevalence (>95% for sows and >90% for piglets) detected in Breeding section 2 at the time of depopulation [ 31] (electronic supplementary material).
